title: My brother Jack
creator_credit: Daryl Wayland and Country Education Project
brief_description: Part one: Presents an interview with Jack Johnston’s wife and daughter to provide a background to the novel “My brother Jack”. Part Two: Features John Barnes of La Trobe University discussing the main issues raised in the book.
